root.name: Diner Dash
root.description: Diner Dash is a popular casual game, where the goal is to run a successful diner. Players take control of Flo as she rushes around the diner trying to cater to her customer's needs. The gameplay itself is reminicent of another casual game, Cake Mania, which was also released around the same time. Along with Bejewled and other Popcap games, Diner Dash and Cake Mania helped usher something of a casual reveloution with many designers seeing that you didn't have to neccesarily make violent or complex games for your game to be successful.

similar_games.game: Diner Dash: Flo on the Go
